scripts.test-push-action: docker build -f Dockerfile.local -t universal-charter-local . && docker run --rm universal-charter-local bash -c 'cd charter && npx markdown-transclusion v1.md > ../index_temp.html 2>/dev/null && tail -n +4 ../index_temp.html > ../index.html && rm ../index_temp.html && echo "Charter processed to index.html" && ls -la ../index.html && head -10 ../index.html'
scripts.test-push-action-save: rm -rf ./output && mkdir -p ./output && docker build -f Dockerfile.local -t universal-charter-local . && docker run --name temp-charter universal-charter-local bash -c 'cd charter && npx markdown-transclusion v1.md > v1-expanded.md && npx markdown-transclusion v1.md > ../index_temp.html 2>/dev/null && tail -n +4 ../index_temp.html > ../index.html && rm ../index_temp.html && echo "Charter processed" && node ../.github/scripts/build-site.js && echo "Site built"' && docker cp temp-charter:/workspace/. ./output/ && docker rm temp-charter && echo "Full artifact saved to ./output/" && (command -v open >/dev/null && open ./output/index.html || command -v xdg-open >/dev/null && xdg-open ./output/index.html || echo "Please open ./output/index.html manually")
